page.title: 11TREFNANT JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Today we went to the Junior School in Trefnant. It is a small school with about 50 children with 5 teachers. It was totally different to a Secondary School. The children were very noisy and excited at seeing me, Joanne, Michelle and Jenny with the video camera. We interviewed Rachel Closparry who has only been living here since last October. She said that she was just finishing her first years teaching at this school although she has been teaching for about 30 years. She enjoys teaching very much and she says that the children are very willing to learn and that they are very good in their work. We asked her if they spoke Welsh at all at home , she said mostly English but some of them do speak Welsh.
